Chest (thorax): Heart - Left ventricle of heart
Chest (thorax): Heart - Right ventricle of heart
Chest (thorax): Heart - Left atrium of heart,
Chest (thorax): Heart - Right atrium of heart
Chest (thorax): Breast - Breast bud (in male or prepubertal female)
Chest (thorax): Breast - Breast bud (in male or prepubertal female) (right)
Chest (thorax): Breast - Breast bud (in male or prepubertal female) (left)
Chest (thorax): Breast - Breast bud (in male or prepubertal female) (bilateral)
Chest (thorax): Aorta - Whole aorta above diaphragm
Chest (thorax): Aorta - Descending aorta above diaphragm
Abdomen: Whole (upper) abdomen (diaphragm to iliac crests)
Abdomen: Flank / hemiabdomen (top of diaphragm to iliac crest)
Abdomen: Flank / hemiabdomen (top of diaphragm to iliac crest) (right)
Abdomen: Flank / hemiabdomen (top of diaphragm to iliac crest) (left)
Abdomino-Pelvic (area): Whole abdomiopelvic field; (top of diaphragm to inferior pubis)
Abdomino-Pelvic (area): Flank / hemiabdomen; (top of diaphragm to inferior pubis)
Lower limb: Leg above the knee
Lower limb: Leg above the knee (right)
Lower limb: Leg above the knee (left)
Lower limb: Leg above the knee (bilateral)
Lower limb: Leg below the knee
Lower limb: Leg below the knee (right)
Lower limb: Leg below the knee (left)
Lower limb: Leg below the knee (bilateral)
Special sites: Total body irradiation (TBI) entire body, includes all radiation sites
Special sites: Upper hemi-body includes all radiation sites above the top of the iliac crests/umbilicus
Special sites: Lower hemi-body includes all radiation sites below the top of the iliac crests/umbilicus
Special sites: Total lymphoid irradiation (TLI) includes mantle and inverted Y + splenic fields
Special sites: Subtotal lymphoid irradiation (STLI) mantle + paraaortic+ splenic fields
Special sites: Extended mantle includes mantle and paraaortic fields
Special sites: Mantle includes bilateral cervical (neck), supraclavicular, mediastinal, hilar and axillary fields
Special sites: Mini-mantle includes bilateral cervical (neck) supraclavicular and axillary fields (excludes mediastinal and lung)
Special sites: Inverted Y includes bilateral paraaortic nodes+ iliac nodes +/- splenic fields
Special sites: Whole Central Nervous System /Cranio-Spinal Irradiation, includes the whole brain and the whole spine
